scripts.build:css: npm run build:home && npm run build:tienda && npm run build:componentes && npm run build:404
scripts.build:all: npm run build:css && npm run build:shared && npm run build:blog && npm run postcss:all
scripts.build:critical: npm run build:all && npm run extract:critical
scripts.purge:css: npx purgecss --css assets/css/home.css --content index.html --output assets/css/purged/home-purged.css && npx purgecss --css assets/css/tienda.css --content tienda.html --output assets/css/purged/tienda-purged.css && npx purgecss --css assets/css/componentes.css --content componentes.html --output assets/css/purged/componentes-purged.css && npx purgecss --css assets/css/404.css --content 404.html --output assets/css/purged/404-purged.css && npx purgecss --css assets/css/blog.css --content ../blog-dekary-com/plantilla-nueva.html ../blog-dekary-com/post1.html ../blog-dekary-com/post2.html ../blog-dekary-com/post3.html --output assets/css/purged/blog-purged.css
scripts.build:purged: npm run build:all && npm run purge:css
scripts.build:production: npm run build:purged && npm run optimize:images
scripts.watch:all: npm run build:all && npm run dev
scripts.performance:test: npm run build:production && npm run lighthouse
scripts.build:blog:complete: npm run build:blog && npm run update:blog
